name: Peanut Butter Mousse
description: So airy, rich, and smooth, this Peanut Butter Mousse comes together in minutes using 4 easy ingredients. Itâ€™s a decadent vegan dessert you can layer with goodies and eat with a spoon!
recipeIngredient: 9 ounce package Coco Whip (I used So Delicious brand)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl of a stand mixer with whisk attachment (or use an electric hand mixer), beat the peanut butter and cream cheese until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl of a stand mixer with whisk attachment (or use an electric hand mixer), beat the peanut butter and cream cheese until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the powdered sugar and beat it in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the powdered sugar and beat it in.

recipeInstructions.text: Lastly, add the whipped topping and beat until combined and smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Lastly, add the whipped topping and beat until combined and smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with optional toppings. I like to crush a few graham crackers and make peanut butter mousse parfaits, layered with vegan whipped cream, chocolate sauce, the graham cracker crumbs and vegan peanut butter cups.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with optional toppings. I like to crush a few graham crackers and make peanut butter mousse parfaits, layered with vegan whipped cream, chocolate sauce, the graham cracker crumbs and vegan peanut butter cups.

keywords: peanut butter mousse, vegan peanut butter mousse
